titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the exemption from income tax for social clubs found to be practicing prohibited discrimination.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the exemption from income tax for social clubs found to be practicing prohibited discrimination.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny tax-exempt status to any social club which has been found, pursuant to a determination by a court or government agency, to have a pattern or practice of prohibited discrimination.
